A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible movie that ruins the lore and mythology of Star Wars.   The original trilogy is my favorite series of movies ever and this film did nothing but tarnish the legacy of those movies.  The portrayal of Luke Skywalker in this film is actually worse than the worst scenario that I had imagined.   There was no way they could screw this up in my mind\, I said to myself\, before watching the movie.   They did not just screw this movie up\, they ruined Star Wars forever for me.   I will not be seeing any of the future films released by Lucasfilm/Disney.    They have lost a long time fan.
